Class PhotoDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.PhotoDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Error, Logout

    public class PhotoDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
implements Error, Logout
    PhotoDisplayController controls the display of the photo PhotoDisplayController implements Error interface and Logout interface
    Author:
    Jasmine Buttar, Zalak Shingala
